message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  How about we split the difference and settle at $105?
I'm still interested in the product, but $105 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
